alert.note: Alert for South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 8:19PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN AITKIN COUNTY THROUGH 845 PM CDT... At 819 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Malmo, or 14 miles east of Mille Lacs Lake, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... McGrath around 840 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Arthyde, Dads Corner and Glen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. This storm may intensify. Monitor local NOAA Weather Radio,!** commercial radio, or television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
